verbs.description: Former GOP Senator and [V: failed] [ARG1: presidential candidate] Rick Santorum got hammered from all sides on Sunday morning after he attempted to defend the Trump administration by dismissing reports that immigration officials lost track of nearly 1,500 immigrant children who were ripped from their parents , saying that is how the system works .
